author: Vertyco
description: Allow server owners to customize the bot's avatar, banner, and bio on a per-server basis with optional role-based access control.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Whitelabel!

Server owners with Manage Server permission can use `/botprofile` commands to customize the bot's profile in their server.

Bot owners can configure access control with `[p]whitelabel` commands.

For more information, check `[p]help whitelabel` or read the README.
short: Per-server bot profile customization with role-based access control
